Sinopse: A road-movie loosely based on real-life door to door sales program that takes thousands of European students each year to America. Four Estonian students: Norris, a charismatic sales leader, Martin, a nerd, Anna, an adventurous cute girl and Alan, a rookie. 3 months. Six thousand miles from home. In an unbearably hot desert town in the middle of nowhere. Working 16 hours a day. Selling educational comic books door to door to American families. They were promised the adventure of a lifetime and the opportunity to make a lot of money - but is everything still as it seems? Who will win - they or the 'bookfield'?—AnonymousB
